videos.title: Renting vs Buying a Home: The Lie You‚Äôve Been Told
videos.description: The rent vs buy debate has been framed wrong all along. It's not rent OR buy - it's rent BEFORE buy. Here's the strategy: Instead of committing crores to a property you've only seen a few times, rent in that location first. Live there for 6 months to a year. Then, when you're absolutely certain and your finances are ready, buy a property in that same building or neighborhood.
